title.value: HMGB1 was measured after in vitro irradiation by ELISA. CD276 as a possible target for immunotherapy was measured by flow cytometry.
title.justification: The title encapsulates the main focus of the research which is the measurement of HMGB1 and CD276 in the context of irradiation.
title.quote: HMGB1 was measured after in vitro irradiation by ELISA. CD276 as a possible target for immunotherapy was measured by flow cytometry.

extractions.description: This paper discusses the establishment of stem-cell enriched cell lines from tumor samples, measuring HMGB1 and CD276 after irradiation, and investigating their potential in immunotherapy.

type.justification: The study involves experimental measurement and observation processes, indicating it is empirical.
type.quote: Of the eleven collected samples, stem-cell enriched cultures could be established in six cases...CD276 surface abundance was evaluated in SWS872 and showed the highest increase 48h after irradiation.

name.justification: The research primarily focuses on stem cell lines and targets for immunotherapy in various types of sarcomas, a sub-field of cancer research.
name.quote: Stem-cell enriched cell lines could be established for six of eleven tumor samples of different histologic subtypes.

name.justification: The paper evaluates CD276 as a target for immunotherapy.
name.quote: CD276 as a possible target for immunotherapy was measured by flow cytometry.

name.justification: The study involves irradiation of cell lines and the effects measured post-irradiation.
name.quote: After irradiation with 16 Gy three of four cell lines showed a significant increase of HMGB1 in supernatant compared to unirradiated controls.

name.justification: These prostate models were explicitly mentioned as part of the experiments conducted in the research.
name.quote: To better understand this, we conducted a detailed analysis... across a panel of androgen-insensitive (PC3) and androgen-sensitive (LNCaP) prostate models.

is_contributed.justification: The models are standard prostate cancer cell lines and not developed in this study.
is_contributed.quote: a panel of androgen-insensitive (PC3) and androgen-sensitive (LNCaP) prostate models

is_executed.justification: These models were used in the study to analyze the effects of various treatments.
is_executed.quote: To better understand this, we conducted a detailed analysis... across a panel of androgen-insensitive (PC3) and androgen-sensitive (LNCaP) prostate models.

is_compared.justification: The paper does not present these models as being compared against other different models.
is_compared.quote: To better understand this, we conducted a detailed analysis... across a panel of androgen-insensitive (PC3) and androgen-sensitive (LNCaP) prostate models.

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no specific referenced paper title provided for these models.
referenced_paper_title.quote: To better understand this, we conducted a detailed analysis... across a panel of androgen-insensitive (PC3) and androgen-sensitive (LNCaP) prostate models.

name.justification: ATCC cell lines are mentioned as a baseline for comparisons with the primary stem cell enriched lines.
name.quote: HMGB1 concentrations were higher in the supernatant of primary stem cell enriched cell lines compared to ATCC cell lines.

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no specific referenced paper associated with the ATCC cell lines as they are standard research cell lines.
referenced_paper_title.quote: HMGB1 concentrations were higher in the supernatant of primary stem cell enriched cell lines compared to ATCC cell lines.

name.justification: Specific cell line used in measuring CD276 surface abundance post-irradiation.
name.quote: CD276 surface abundance was evaluated in SWS872 and showed the highest increase 48h after irradiation.

referenced_paper_title.justification: There is no referenced paper title explicitly linked to the usage of SWS872.
referenced_paper_title.quote: CD276 surface abundance was evaluated in SWS872 and showed the highest increase 48h after irradiation.
